## Token.color property

The color is described in its essential parts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
color?: {
        r: number;
        g: number;
        b: number;
        a: number;
        visible: boolean;
    };
```

## Remarks

- `r` - red

- `g` - green

- `b` - blue

- `a` - alpha

- `visible` - if completely transparent
